name: Brick-Anoid
description:
Simple "Breakout" clone made in Unity. Use your mouse to control the paddle and keep the ball on the screen. As you break trough walls bricks become smaller walls become harder to break down. See how many walls you can break and compete  on the global leader-board. 

Controls:

  • Mouse moves the paddle
  • ESC opens pause menu

New versions will get tweaks to wall generation, ball and paddle control and power-ups. As new versions get released high scores will be reset to reflect game-play changes.

Thanks for playing and have fun
